mention.text: chairman of the National Transportation Safety Board '' There may not be sufficient safety standards , '' he said , adding that his agency has probed fires aboard four cruise ships in the past five years '' The potential for loss of life is enormous
the chairman of a federal agency investigating the March engine-room fire aboard the Scandinavian Star

the National Transportation Safety Board '' There may not be sufficient safety standards , '' he said , adding that his agency has probed fires aboard four cruise ships in the past five years '' The potential for loss of life is enormous
